solution_line_template: Shelby and her mom made {dozen_bags_buttered_popcorn} bags of buttered popcorn + {caramel_popcorn_initial} bags of caramel popcorn = <<{dozen_bags_buttered_popcorn}+{caramel_popcorn_initial}={total_initial_popcorn}>>{total_initial_popcorn} bags.

Of those {total_initial_popcorn} bags, her brother took {alan_took_buttered} bags of buttered popcorn + {alan_took_caramel} bag of caramel popcorn = <<{alan_took_buttered}+{alan_took_caramel}={alan_took_total}>>{alan_took_total} bags.
So now Shelby has {total_initial_popcorn} bags - {alan_took_total} bags = <<{total_initial_popcorn}-{alan_took_total}={popcorn_left}>>{popcorn_left} bags of popcorn left.
